definition[0]: bringing the best possible profits or advantages for the lowest possible costs
example[0]: The procedure is quick, easy to use, and cost effective.
example[1]: the most cost-effective way of reducing carbon dioxide emissions
definition[1]: bringing the best possible advantages in relation to costs
